item.title: Need help
item.dc:creator: @sonjichan sonjichan
item.description:
@sonjichan wrote:

um… I can honestly say man… there is too many private servers out there for them to waste the money on lawsuits, and even if they did I can honestly say it would probably be groundless since copyright laws sometimes differ from country to country, also… you should probably search up “International Copyright and Trademark infringement laws” on google or something, then draw your own conclusions. As long as you don’t really charge money for it. I don’t think they’ll care, or try to sell it. Just don’t go around pretending like it’s your totally own unique original game that you designed from the ground up, then charge people money to play and view it. Also I believe jagex is based in the UK, so if your in the US. there’s little they can do.

Read full topic
